description.value:
A small set of Screwdrivers, wrenches, wire, and other basic maintenance items for routine repairs. May also contain a roll of tape and a small multi-purpose axe.

Requirements

Part of the Standard Kit of all Guardsmen. Total Weight: ~32kg, Total Cost: 185 Thrones. HB: Get it all at once acquisition at Scarce Availability

Effect: Common

Notes: 15 T
